events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me well. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to product dissatisfaction and size mismatch.
The case has been assigned to support agent Linda M to assist the customer with the return and refund process.
Hello! This is Linda from customer support. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way? This helps us process your return smoothly.
Sure, my order number is 456789123. The jacket is brand new, tried it only once and decided it’s too small for me. No damage or stains at all.

Thank you for the details! We have initiated the return process. Please send the jacket back using the provided shipping label, and once we receive it, a full refund will be issued to your original payment method.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate how easy you’re making this return process.
I’m glad I could help! Please let us know once you ship the jacket back so we can track your return and expedite your refund.
Just checking in to see if you have shipped the jacket back and if you have received any confirmation regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent the jacket yesterday and received an email confirming the package delivery to your returns center. Looking forward to getting my refund.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We have sent a short survey to your email to gather feedback on your return experience. Your input is valuable to us.
Thank you for contacting customer support. Your refund case has been closed. We hope to serve you better in the future.
The refund support case for order 456789123 has been archived following standard data retention policies.
